welcome_message_body: Welcome to Stanford le Hope, a charming town known for its beautiful parks and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take some time to explore all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Southend Airport is dedicated to low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, duty-free shops, and currency exchange services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Biggin Hill Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for VIP travelers, with private lounges, concierge services, and gourmet catering options.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
